name: ai-hypnosis
description: Revolutionary AI-powered hypnotism platform with offensive and defensive capabilities

scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name ai-hypnosis
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run db:migrate:prod && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name ai-hypnosis
scripts.start: npm run clean-port && npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs
scripts.restart: npm run clean-port && pm2 restart ai-hypnosis
scripts.db:reset: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed
scripts.git:init: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit'
